COMBAT_CAROUSEL.SETTINGS.OverlayConfigH: Open the form to configure the Combatant Overlay
COMBAT_CAROUSEL.SETTINGS.CollapseNavH: Collapse the Scene Navigation Bar when Combat Carousel is rendered
COMBAT_CAROUSEL.SETTINGS.ShowBar1H: Shows resource bar (if configured). Options are: Always: always show the bar (if any). Active Combatant: only show the bar for the Active Combatant. Hover: only show the bar on hover. Never: never show the bar. Note: additional GM settings may restrict bar visibility.
COMBAT_CAROUSEL.SETTINGS.Bar1PermissionH: Define what circumstances to show bar 1 to players. All: show bars on all Combatants. Owned: bars shown for any tokens the player owns. Observer: bars shown for any tokens the player has observer permission on. None: Do not show players any bars.
COMBAT_CAROUSEL.SETTINGS.ShowOverlayH: Shows overlay (if configured). Options are: Always: always show the overlay. Active Combatant: only show the overlay for the Active Combatant. Hover: only show the overlay on hover. Never: never show the overlay. Note: additional GM settings may restrict overlay visibility.
COMBAT_CAROUSEL.SETTINGS.OverlayPermissi: Define what circumstances to show Overlay to players. All: show overlay on all Combatants. Owner: overlay shown for any tokens the player owns. Observer: overlay shown for any tokens the player has observer permission on. None: Do not show players any overlay.
COMBAT_CAROUSEL.SETTINGS.Bar1AttributeH: Enter a path to an Actor attribute to use for the bar. Single value attributes will show a single number. Attributes with a value and a max property will show a meter that depletes as the value decreases (eg. health).
COMBAT_CAROUSEL.SETTINGS.Bar1TitleH: The name to be displayed on the bar (eg. HP)
COMBAT_CAROUSEL.SETTINGS.ShowInitiativeH: Shows initiative value (if any). Options are: Always: always show the value (if any). Active Combatant: only show the value for the Active Combatant. Hover: only show the value on hover. Never: never show the value.
COMBAT_CAROUSEL.SETTINGS.ShowInitiativeI: Shows initiative icon (if any). Options are: Always: always show the icon (if any). With Initiative Value: show icon when initiative is shown. For Unrolled Combatants: show icon when combatant has no initiative value. Never: never show the icon
COMBAT_CAROUSEL.SETTINGS.InitiativePermi: Define what circumstances to show Initiative to players. All: show initiative on all Combatants. Owner: initiative shown for any tokens the player owns. Observer: initiative shown for any tokens the player has observer permission on. None: Do not show players any initiative.
COMBAT_CAROUSEL.SETTINGS.ImageTypeH: Select which Image to use for Combatants in the Carousel. Options are: Actor: the Actor's image. Token Actor: the Token Actor's image (will show Actor image if Token Actor image not set). Token: The token's image
COMBAT_CAROUSEL.SETTINGS.CarouselSizeH: The size of the Carousel on the screen. HUD/Control elements are not scaled.
COMBAT_CAROUSEL.CAROUSEL.NextRoundToolti: Click to proceed to Next Round
COMBAT_CAROUSEL.CAROUSEL.PreviousRoundTo: Click to return to Previous Round
COMBAT_CAROUSEL.CAROUSEL.ToggleHint: Click to hide/unhide, Right-click for config
COMBAT_CAROUSEL.CAROUSEL.DragTooltip: Click and drag to move, right-click to reset position
COMBAT_CAROUSEL.COMBATANT_CARD.EditIniti: Click to Edit, Right-Click to reset (GM Only)
COMBAT_CAROUSEL.ABOUT.Label: About Combat Carousel
COMBAT_CAROUSEL.OVERLAY_CONFIG.Title: Combat Carousel | Overlay Config
COMBAT_CAROUSEL.OVERLAY_CONFIG.Name: Overlay Config
COMBAT_CAROUSEL.TOGGLE_BUTTON.Tooltip: Combat Carousel - click to toggle visibility, right-click to reset position
COMBAT_CAROUSEL.WORDS.Name: Name
